    Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â±      When Glenn began the "Lost Tracks" project, the songs        Ã‚Â±Ãƒâ€º

    Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â±      himself.                                                     Ã‚Â±Ãƒâ€º
    Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â±                                                                   Ã‚Â±Ãƒâ€º
    Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â±      The 26 songs on "The Lost Tracks of Danzig" are              Ã‚Â±Ãƒâ€º

    Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â±      Lucifuge", "Crawl Across Your Killing Floor",                Ã‚Â±Ãƒâ€º

    Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â±                                                                   Ã‚Â±Ãƒâ€º

    Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â±                                                                   Ã‚Â±Ãƒâ€º
    Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â±      "The Lost Tracks of Danzig" will also contain a special      Ã‚Â±Ãƒâ€º

    Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â±      Long before NINE INCH NAILS, MARILYN MANSON or GUNS N&#039;       Ã‚Â±Ãƒâ€º
    Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â±      ROSES, there was Glenn Danzig. Danzig is arguably the        Ã‚Â±Ãƒâ€º
    Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â±      most versatile talent to emerge from hardcore&#039;s first        Ã‚Â±Ãƒâ€º
    Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â±      wave ? a graphic designer, photographer, comic book          Ã‚Â±Ãƒâ€º
    Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â±      publisher and composer who writes all his bands&#039; music.      Ã‚Â±Ãƒâ€º
    Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â±      His songs have been covered by GUNS N&#039; ROSES, METALLICA      Ã‚Â±Ãƒâ€º
    Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â±      and MY CHEMICAL ROMANCE. He&#039;s written for Johnny Cash        Ã‚Â±Ãƒâ€º
    Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â±      and Roy Orbison. Glenn Danzig has received many titles,      Ã‚Â±Ãƒâ€º
    Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â±      from the Godfather of Dark Metal to a man of integrity,      Ã‚Â±Ãƒâ€º
    Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â±      but most agree that over his three-decades career, his       Ã‚Â±Ãƒâ€º
    Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â±      intense musical and lyrical statements have left a           Ã‚Â±Ãƒâ€º
    Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â±      permanent mark on rock music.                                Ã‚Â±Ãƒâ€º
    Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â±                                                                   Ã‚Â±Ãƒâ€º
    Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â±      Founder of the MISFITS, that band pioneered dark             Ã‚Â±Ãƒâ€º
    Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â±      horror/hardcore punk and has become a seminal band of        Ã‚Â±Ãƒâ€º
    Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â±      the genre, despite only six years and a few albums. The      Ã‚Â±Ãƒâ€º
    Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â±      goth metal-punk band SAMHAIN quickly followed and in         Ã‚Â±Ãƒâ€º
    Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â±      just another few years became a noted outfit. Darker         Ã‚Â±Ãƒâ€º
    Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â±      than SAMHAIN, DANZIG&#039;s music evolved into a potent mix       Ã‚Â±Ãƒâ€º
    Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â±      of gothic metal and blues with a Satanic twist. In           Ã‚Â±Ãƒâ€º
    Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â±      2006, the ever-surprising Glenn Danzig released his          Ã‚Â±Ãƒâ€º
    Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â±      second classical album, "Black Aria 2", which debuted        Ã‚Â±Ãƒâ€º
    Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â±      in the Top Ten ? imagine, the Godfather of Dark Metal        Ã‚Â±Ãƒâ€º
    Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â±      keeping company on the Billboard classical chart with        Ã‚Â±Ãƒâ€º
    Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â±      Itzhak Perlman and Andrea Bocelli.                           Ã‚Â±Ãƒâ€º
